title: World missions 2017 bugged 100%
body:
I have bought the  Master pass, same as my friends. Same day. All of us. 
Now i cannot finish the "Legendary pursuit" mission. It says i have done 5/6 quest. 
I have completed ALL of the available quests, just like ALL of my friends. Still i did not complete the "Legendary pursiut" mission, UNLIKE MY FRIENDS, thus i cannot receive the World orb as a reward. 
I have paid in order to obtain the master pass, and now i have to wait another 7 days to get my rewards??? That sux really.....
If it was someting for free, i would not complain, but this really sux. 

I am not the only one with the same problem, but it seems that the support is too occupied - https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/TmkWlskF-legendary-pursuit-mission

For more than 30-35 hours i cannot reach the support or submit a ticket, due to login issue. 

I hope the issue will be resolved in less than a week, or i would like to be compensated - what is the point of buying something with reall money?

replies.body: Hey, reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can take a deeper look at your missions progress.  We're happy to grant you completion if we find an error, but we need to get more info on why this is happening to some players. See you there!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=ucl8cjyL,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-10-04T18:06:56.119+0000)
>
> Hey, reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can take a deeper look at your missions progress.  We're happy to grant you completion if we find an error, but we need to get more info on why this is happening to some players. See you there!

hey, thanks god i had to wait 24 hours for u to reply here, in order to submit a ticket (i have waited ~48 hours to submit a ticket, due to problem with ticket submission) so i have to wait another 48-72 hours for someone to reply to my ticket. Finally the new world missions will come, i will complete the mission i was talking about, and the help Suport provides, will be....wait...what help? Ah yeah, its not like i paid in order to get some content, so i better shut up and just wait patiently for someone from your support to tell me "did you restart your client yet? please, submit a ticket so we can help you"  - 100%
it seems i get attention or help only when i say im done spending money on RP - this usually speeds up the reply of your support.

> [{quoted}](name=demonical rage,realm=EUNE,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=ucl8cjyL,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-10-06T08:16:57.788+0000)

Ah yeah, its not like i paid in order to get some content, so i better shut up and just wait patiently for someone from your support to tell me "did you restart your client yet? please, submit a ticket so we can help you"  - 100%
> it seems i get attention or help only when i say im done spending money on RP - this usually speeds up the reply of your support.

i wait 1 week for your support to get in touch with me. thanks god i paid for the content i did not receive, so i wouldnt even receive a reply from the support : D
cheers and u will take my money for RP again like...never ? : D

p.s. on the 3rd and 5th days i tried to restart the client, still my missions are bugged : D
